Tools.Name: Content Safety (Text Analyze)
Tools.Description: Use Azure Content Safety to detect harmful content.

Tools.Name: Embedding
Tools.Description: Use Open AI's embedding model to create an embedding vector representing the input text.

Tools.Name: Open Source LLM
Tools.Description: Use an Open Source model from the Azure Model catalog, deployed to an AzureML Online Endpoint for LLM Chat or Completion API calls.

Tools.Name: Serp API
Tools.Description: Use Serp API to obtain search results from a specific search engine.

Tools.Name: Faiss Index Lookup
Tools.Description: Search vector based query from the FAISS index file.

Tools.Name: Vector DB Lookup
Tools.Description: Search vector based query from existing Vector Database.

Tools.Name: Vector Index Lookup
Tools.Description: Search text or vector based query from AzureML Vector Index.
